data.eml:eml: Leptothorax athabasca sp. n. (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Alberta, Canada, an ant with an apparently restricted range.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Buschinger, A., Schulz, A. (2008): Leptothorax athabasca sp. n. (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Alberta, Canada, an ant with an apparently restricted range. Myrmecologische Nachrichten 11: 243-248, URL: http://hdl.handle.net/10199/19086
